Event.Text: A crashed rover wreck draws closer directly in our path. Upon closer inspection, it appears to have been deserted for only a few days. Claw marks slashed along its hull with a torn open door suggests a pack of Hounders attacked, and did away with the occupants. After entering the rover to investigate its contents, a message plays from its speakers. "Unidentified occupants, suppress classified information leakage, initiating irreversible self destruct in 0 seconds" Time begins ticking down from the speakers. We don't have time to loot everything inside the rover.

Choice.Text: Grab alcohol kegs and boxes of rations
Grab oxygen tanks and fuel tins
{Cyberpunk} Meg tells everyone to escape, as she grabs the rovers data storage card
